item.description:
Mike Girard of the RI Skeptics Society, The Cranston Public Library and Strange New England present:

"THE STRANGEST OF THE STRANGE: Strange Tales of Startling Suspense"

Ghosts! Demon Birds! Alien Visitors!

Free and open to the public
Tuesday October 26

6:30 - 7:30 pm

Join us for an evening with Miguel Girard, editor of Strange New England. Hear stories of New England haunting and horrors, as well as tales of mythical creatures and mystical places. No registration is necessary. Each participant will receive a free souvenir map of one of the regions spookiest places.

For more information visit cranstonlibrary.org and click on "Events and Exhibits"

Cranston Public Library
140 Sockanosset Cross Road
Cranston RI 02920
item.name: Strange Tales of Startling Suspense!!!
